text.body:
<div type="collation" xml:id="Unit_C25"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C25"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C25_app2-fMS_start"/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16243"/> <metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16243"/> At Cologne we descended <lb n="c57-0090__main__18"/>to the plains of Holland <seg xml:id="C25_app2-fMS_end"/> & we resolved to <lb n="c57-0090__main__19"/>post the remainder of our <seg xml:id="C25_app4-fMS_start"/> way <seg xml:id="C25_app4-fMS_end"/> for <lb n="c57-0090__main__20"/>the wind was <seg xml:id="C25_app6-fMS_start"/> contrary <seg xml:id="C25_app6-fMS_end"/> & the stream of <lb n="c57-0090__main__21"/>the river was too gentle to aid us. <seg xml:id="C25_app8-fMS_start"/> We now <lb n="c57-0090__main__22"/>arrived at very different country. The <lb n="c57-0090__main__23"/>soil was sandy and the wheels sunk deep <lb n="c57-0090__main__24"/>in it. The towns of th <mod sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16264"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16268"/>is <sga-add eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16268"/> <mod eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16264"/> country are the <lb n="c57-0090__main__25"/>most pleasing part of the scene. The <lb n="c57-0090__main__26"/>Dutch are extremely neat but there is <lb n="c57-0090__main__27"/>an awkwardness in their contrivances <lb n="c57-0090__main__28"/>that often surprised us. In one place, <lb n="c57-0090__main__29"/>I remember, a wind mill was <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0090__main__d4e16283">placed</del> <lb n="c57-0090__main__30"/>situated in such a manner that the <lb n="c57-0090__main__31"/>postillion was obliged to guide the <w ana="start"/>car<lb n="c57-0090__main__32"/>riage<w ana="end"/> close to the opposite side of the <lb n="c57-0090__main__33"/>road to escape from the sweep of its <lb n="c57-0090__main__34"/>sails. The way often led between two <w ana="start"/>ca<lb n="c57-0090__main__35"/>nals<w ana="end"/> where the road was only broard<zone eID="c57-0090__main"/> <surface eID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0090"/> <surface lrx="5138" lry="7032" partOf="#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="46r" shelfmark="MS. Abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091" sID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0091.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sID="c57-0091__main"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__1"/>enough to allow one carriage to pass <lb n="c57-0091__main__2"/>and when we met another vehicle <lb n="c57-0091__main__3"/>which was frequently the case we were <lb n="c57-0091__main__4"/>rolled back sometimes for nearly a <lb n="c57-0091__main__5"/>mile untill we found one of the <lb n="c57-0091__main__6"/>drawbridges which led to the fields, down <lb n="c57-0091__main__7"/>on which one carriage remained <lb n="c57-0091__main__8"/>while the other <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16334">carriage</del> passed <lb n="c57-0091__main__9"/>on. They soak their flax also in the <lb n="c57-0091__main__10"/>mud of their canals and place it <lb n="c57-0091__main__11"/>against the trees along the road side <lb n="c57-0091__main__12"/>to dry. When the sun is hot the <lb n="c57-0091__main__13"/>scent <mod sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16348"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16350">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16353"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16353"/> <mod eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16348"/> this exhales is not very <lb n="c57-0091__main__14"/>easily endured. Yet the roads are <lb n="c57-0091__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16362">good</del> excellent & the verdure beautiful<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C25_app8-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__16"/>From <seg xml:id="C25_app10-fMS_start"/> Rotterdam <seg xml:id="C25_app10-fMS_end"/> we <seg xml:id="C25_app12-fMS_start"/> went <seg xml:id="C25_app12-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__17"/>by sea to England. It was on a clear <seg xml:id="C25_app14-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__18"/>morning <seg xml:id="C25_app14-fMS_end"/> in the latter <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16373"/>days <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16373"/>of <seg xml:id="C25_app17-fMS_start"/> September <seg xml:id="C25_app17-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__19"/>that I first saw the white cliffs of <lb n="c57-0091__main__20"/>Britain. The banks <seg xml:id="C25_app19-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16381"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16383"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16383"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16389"/>of the <seg xml:id="C25_app19-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16389"/><mod eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16381"/>Thames presented <lb n="c57-0091__main__21"/>a new scene; they were <seg xml:id="C25_app21-fMS_start"/> flat <seg xml:id="C25_app21-fMS_end"/> but <seg xml:id="C25_app23-fMS_start"/> fertile <lb n="c57-0091__main__22"/> & almost every town was marked by <lb n="c57-0091__main__23"/>some story. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16400">Th</del> <seg xml:id="C25_app23-fMS_end"/> We saw Tilbury <seg xml:id="C25_app25-fMS_start"/> Fort &<lb n="c57-0091__main__24"/>remembered <seg xml:id="C25_app25-fMS_end"/> the Spanish Armada; <lb n="c57-0091__main__25"/>Gravesend, Woolwich, <seg xml:id="C25_app27-fMS_start"/> Greenwich <seg xml:id="C25_app27-fMS_end"/> places <lb n="c57-0091__main__26"/>which I had heard of even in my <lb n="c57-0091__main__27"/>country. At length we saw the <w ana="start"/>nume<lb n="c57-0091__main__28"/>rous<w ana="end"/> steeples of <seg xml:id="C25_app31-fMS_start"/> London; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16418">&</del> St Pauls <lb n="c57-0091__main__29"/>towerering <seg xml:id="C25_app31-fMS_end"/> above <seg xml:id="C25_app33-fMS_start"/> all <seg xml:id="C25_app33-fMS_end"/> & the Tower famed <lb n="c57-0091__main__30"/>in English History. <lb n="c57-0092__main__1"/> <seg xml:id="C25_app37-fMS_start"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0092.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16439">11</del> 2. <anchor xml:id="c57-0092.02"/> <seg xml:id="C25_app37-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C25_app39-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__2"/>London <seg xml:id="C25_app39-fMS_end"/> was <seg xml:id="C25_app41-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16449">the</del> our present point <lb n="c57-0092__main__3"/>of rest; we determined to remain several <lb n="c57-0092__main__4"/>months in this wonderful & celebrated city. <seg xml:id="C25_app41-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app42-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__5"/>Cl <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16458"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16462"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16462"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16468"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16468"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16458"/> rval <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16473"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16475">wished</del> <seg xml:id="C25_app42-fMS_end"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16478"/>desired <seg xml:id="C25_app44-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16478"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16473"/> for the intercourse of <lb n="c57-0092__main__6"/>the men of genius & talent who <w ana="start"/>flou<lb n="c57-0092__main__7"/>rished<w ana="end"/> at <seg xml:id="C25_app44-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app45-fMS_start"/> that <seg xml:id="C25_app45-fMS_end"/> time; but this <seg xml:id="C25_app47-fMS_start"/> was, <seg xml:id="C25_app47-fMS_end"/> with <seg xml:id="C25_app49-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__8"/>me, <seg xml:id="C25_app49-fMS_end"/> a secondary <seg xml:id="C25_app51-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16493"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16495">consideration</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16498"/>object <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16498"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16493"/> ; <seg xml:id="C25_app51-fMS_end"/> I was <w ana="start"/>princi<lb n="c57-0092__main__9"/>pally<w ana="end"/> occupied with the means of obtaining <lb n="c57-0092__main__10"/>the information necessary for the <w ana="start"/>comple<lb n="c57-0092__main__11"/>tion<w ana="end"/> of my <seg xml:id="C25_app53-fMS_start"/> promise <seg xml:id="C25_app53-fMS_end"/> and quickly availed <lb n="c57-0092__main__12"/>myself of the letters of introduction that <lb n="c57-0092__main__13"/>I had brought with <seg xml:id="C25_app55-fMS_start"/> me <seg xml:id="C25_app55-fMS_end"/> addressed to <lb n="c57-0092__main__14"/>the <seg xml:id="C25_app57-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16523"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16525">various</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16528"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16528"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16534"/>most <seg xml:id="C25_app57-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app58-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16534"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16537">men of sci</del> <mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16523"/> distinguished <lb n="c57-0092__main__15"/>natural philosophers. <seg xml:id="C25_app58-fMS_end"/> If this journey had <lb n="c57-0092__main__16"/>taken place during my days of study <seg xml:id="C25_app61-fMS_start"/> &<lb n="c57-0092__main__17"/>happiness <seg xml:id="C25_app61-fMS_end"/> it would have afforded me <lb n="c57-0092__main__18"/>inexpressible <seg xml:id="C25_app63-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16550">delight</del> pleasure. But a <lb n="c57-0092__main__19"/>blight had come over my <seg xml:id="C25_app63-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app64-fMS_start"/> existence <seg xml:id="C25_app64-fMS_end"/> & I only <lb n="c57-0092__main__20"/>visited these people for the sake of the <lb n="c57-0092__main__21"/>information they might give <seg xml:id="C25_app66-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16560">d</del> me on <lb n="c57-0092__main__22"/>the subject in which <seg xml:id="C25_app66-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app67-fMS_start"/> I <seg xml:id="C25_app67-fMS_end"/> was so <seg xml:id="C25_app69-fMS_start"/> deeply <lb n="c57-0092__main__23"/>interrested. <seg xml:id="C25_app69-fMS_end"/> Company was <seg xml:id="C25_app71-fMS_start"/> ir <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16567"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16574"/>k <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16574"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16567"/> some <seg xml:id="C25_app71-fMS_end"/> to me; <lb n="c57-0092__main__24"/>when <seg xml:id="C25_app73-fMS_start"/> alone <seg xml:id="C25_app73-fMS_end"/> I could fill my mind with the <lb n="c57-0092__main__25"/>sights of heaven & earth; the voice of <seg xml:id="C25_app75-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16583">He</del> <lb n="c57-0092__main__26"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0092.01"/><lb n="c57-0092__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0092__left_margin__d4e16597"/>Henry <sga-add eID="c57-0092__left_margin__d4e16597"/>soothed <seg xml:id="C25_app75-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app76-fMS_start"/> me <seg xml:id="C25_app76-fMS_end"/> & I could cheat myself into <seg xml:id="C25_app80-fMS_start"/> a<lb n="c57-0092__main__27"/>transitory <seg xml:id="C25_app80-fMS_end"/> peace. But <seg xml:id="C25_app82-fMS_start"/> busy, uninterresting,<lb n="c57-0092__main__28"/>joyous <seg xml:id="C25_app82-fMS_end"/> faces brought back despair to <seg xml:id="C25_app84-fMS_start"/> my<lb n="c57-0092__main__29"/>heart. <seg xml:id="C25_app84-fMS_end"/> I saw an insurmountable <seg xml:id="C25_app86-fMS_start"/> barrie<lb n="c57-0092__main__30"/>placed <seg xml:id="C25_app86-fMS_end"/> between me & my <seg xml:id="C25_app88-fMS_start"/> fellow men; <seg xml:id="C25_app88-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app89-fMS_start"/> thi<lb n="c57-0092__main__31"/>barrier <seg xml:id="C25_app89-fMS_end"/> was sealed with the blood <seg xml:id="C25_app91-fMS_start"/> of<lb n="c57-0092__main__32"/>William <seg xml:id="C25_app91-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C25_app93-fMS_start"/> Justine, <seg xml:id="C25_app93-fMS_end"/> and to reflect <seg xml:id="C25_app95-fMS_start"/> on<lb n="c57-0092__main__33"/>those <seg xml:id="C25_app95-fMS_end"/> events filled my soul with <seg xml:id="C25_app99-fMS_start"/> anguish<lb n="c57-0092__main__34"/>But in Cl <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16634"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16638"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16638"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16634"/> rval <seg xml:id="C25_app99-fMS_end"/> I saw the image of my <lb n="c57-0092__main__35"/>former self; he was <seg xml:id="C25_app101-fMS_start"/> inquisitive <seg xml:id="C25_app101-fMS_end"/> & anxious <lb n="c57-0093__main__1"/>to gain experience & <seg xml:id="C25_app103-fMS_start"/> instruction; <seg xml:id="C25_app103-fMS_end"/> The <lb n="c57-0093__main__2"/>difference of manners <seg xml:id="C25_app105-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16657"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16659">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16662"/>which <seg xml:id="C25_app105-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16662"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16657"/>he observed <lb n="c57-0093__main__3"/>was to him <seg xml:id="C25_app107-fMS_start"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16668">&</del> an inexhaustible source of <seg xml:id="C25_app107-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app108-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0093.01"/><lb n="c57-0093__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16680"/>observation <seg xml:id="C25_app108-fMS_end"/> & <sga-add eID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16680"/>amusement. <seg xml:id="C25_app111-fMS_start"/> He was for ever <seg xml:id="C25_app111-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app112-fMS_start"/> busy <seg xml:id="C25_app112-fMS_end"/> & the <lb n="c57-0093__main__5"/>only check to his enjoyments was my <seg xml:id="C25_app114-fMS_start"/> <w ana="start"/>sor<lb n="c57-0093__main__6"/>rowful<w ana="end"/>& <seg xml:id="C25_app114-fMS_end"/> dejected <seg xml:id="C25_app116-fMS_start"/> m <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16692"/> <mdel>ei</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16696"/>ie <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16696"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16692"/> n. <seg xml:id="C25_app116-fMS_end"/> I tried to conceal <lb n="c57-0093__main__7"/>this as much as <seg xml:id="C25_app118-fMS_start"/> possible <seg xml:id="C25_app118-fMS_end"/> that I might not <lb n="c57-0093__main__8"/>debar him from the pleasures natural <lb n="c57-0093__main__9"/>to <seg xml:id="C25_app120-fMS_start"/> one <seg xml:id="C25_app120-fMS_end"/> who was entering on a new scene <lb n="c57-0093__main__10"/>of life, undisturbed by any care or <seg xml:id="C25_app122-fMS_start"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16709"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16711"/>the <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16711"/> </del> <w ana="start"/>bitter<lb n="c57-0093__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0093.02"/><lb n="c57-0093__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16725"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16727"/>ness<w ana="end"/> of <sga-add eID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16727"/> </del> <seg xml:id="C25_app122-fMS_end"/> recollection. I often refused to accompany <seg xml:id="C25_app124-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__12"/>him alledging <seg xml:id="C25_app124-fMS_end"/> another <seg xml:id="C25_app126-fMS_start"/> engagement <seg xml:id="C25_app126-fMS_end"/> that <lb n="c57-0093__main__13"/>I might remain <seg xml:id="C25_app128-fMS_start"/> a alone; <seg xml:id="C25_app128-fMS_end"/> I now also <lb n="c57-0093__main__14"/>began to collect the materials necessary <lb n="c57-0093__main__15"/>for my <seg xml:id="C25_app130-fMS_start"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16743">work</del> new <seg xml:id="C25_app130-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app131-fMS_start"/> creation <seg xml:id="C25_app131-fMS_end"/> & this was <seg xml:id="C25_app133-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16746">a</del> to <lb n="c57-0093__main__16"/>me like the torture of single drops of <lb n="c57-0093__main__17"/>water continually falling on the <seg xml:id="C25_app133-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app134-fMS_start"/> head; <seg xml:id="C25_app134-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__18"/>Every thought that was devoted to it <lb n="c57-0093__main__19"/>was <seg xml:id="C25_app136-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16758">th</del> an extreme anguish, and every <lb n="c57-0093__main__20"/>word that I spoke in allusion to it caused <lb n="c57-0093__main__21"/>my lips to <seg xml:id="C25_app136-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app137-fMS_start"/> quiver <seg xml:id="C25_app137-fMS_end"/> & my heart to <seg xml:id="C25_app139-fMS_start"/> palpitate <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16766"/>. <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16766"/><lb n="c57-0093__main__22"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16771">in a most painful degre</del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16774">e.</del> <seg xml:id="C25_app139-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__23"/>After passing some months in <seg xml:id="C25_app141-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__24"/>London <seg xml:id="C25_app141-fMS_end"/> we received a letter from a <lb n="c57-0093__main__25"/>person in <seg xml:id="C25_app143-fMS_start"/> Scotland <seg xml:id="C25_app143-fMS_end"/> who had formerly <lb n="c57-0093__main__26"/>been <seg xml:id="C25_app145-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16788">an</del> our <seg xml:id="C25_app145-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C25_app146-fMS_start"/> visitor <seg xml:id="C25_app146-fMS_end"/> at Geneva. He <lb n="c57-0093__main__27"/>mentioned the beauties of his native <seg xml:id="C25_app148-fMS_start"/> <w ana="start"/>coun<lb n="c57-0093__main__28"/>try<w ana="end"/>& <seg xml:id="C25_app148-fMS_end"/> asked us if those were not sufficient <lb n="c57-0093__main__29"/>allurements to induce us to prolong our <lb n="c57-0093__main__30"/>journey as far <seg xml:id="C25_app150-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16804">noth</del> north as <seg xml:id="C25_app150-fMS_end"/>
